Vm3gV0_svDpZG1eDSG7aDA.text: Food was a bit pricey but worth it. The smoke meats are amazing. The donuts were hot fresh and a perfect touch to the end of the meal.

A_WgtTwtyCTyRpyYO7WaZQ.text: It's nice to see Booby Q expanding eastward towards me.  This location on Camelback near 32nd St has a good amount of parking and an open air feel.  I sat at the bar and the first thing you get is some free corn bread which was really good.  For lunch I went with the brisket tacos.  The serving was a good sized portion and it was full of moist and tasty brisket.  I like this place and will definitely be back from time to time.

x5tGWZ9BBaQ2-iNTlABX_w.text: Natalie was awesome!!!!  She was so sweet and made us feel so welcome. If you come here ask for her. The drinks were delicious and the brisket was great too!  Really a cute place.

C8ZDtoUp8MhH_FtszytSyA.text: One of our best last minute decisions! Food is amazing, with service to match. Jessica was a great help and super friendly. We will definitely visit again!

GL2AbkigsR-QLZrCvz0Ing.text: Food came out fast and everything was delicious and tender. Austin was an amazing waiter.

zlUJVD-4mKs1U-AiTTz6sQ.text: My favorite place for special occasions!!! I almost don't want to write a good review because I want to be able to get a table! Food is amazing!' My sons love the BBQ choices, (ribs, brisket etc) but for my the salmon is the best! The sides are delicious and portions here are abundant. Service always friendly and timely. Little pricey, but very much worth it!

vqIdoS1Jrmm7pzPGc7k3ZA.text: The ambience, food, and employees are all 5 stars no doubt. We ordered different things and i was able to try all of them. I had the beef barbque brisket sandwich and the meat was very tender and it had the perfect taste by far the best brisket i have had thus far. The other entrees ordered were the perfect hamburger and the vegetarian burger. I was impressed by the taste, because I felt like I was eating hamburger meat. I'm not vegetarian by all means, but this burger was delicious. We also ordered some delicious drinks and the pina colada was a bit strong, but loved the presentation.

ZkJYihw9E48CK3cTR8xPVQ.text: Our experience has always been amazing at every location! The food is absolutely delicious and we come here for all our special occasions! I would recommend this restaurant to anybody! Specially the smokehouse burger, I get it every time!

6_dgizT6KR0KnPOvAdKBOg.text: Wonderful ribs!  Brussels sprouts and whipped potatoes are great as is the service and ambiance too.

HFvjKeZriMKXCeK6UkvdrQ.text: We have been to the Dunlap Bobby Q's for years, taking my grandma every year for her birthday. Since we live closer to this one, we decided to go here since we were randomly craving some bbq and didn't realize this location was just hiding in the shopping center for a year! The restaurant is soooo beautiful. I am obsessed with all the brick work, so if anything just come here for how pretty and cozy it is. Everyone was so friendly, multiple people greeted us as well as welcomed us to come back when we were leaving. Even the manager (I think) was stopping at every table to see how everything was. The booths were comfy and also nicer looking. The restaurant is also open until 2am!   The food was pretty much on point as the other location. The only downside is that the menu is limited and we were so sad when we were told they don't have gravy. Who sells mashed potatoes without gravy?! I think they should if anything just make gravy so people can order it on the side. We were bummed as we then did not get the mashed potatoes. The Mac and cheese was great, but very very cheesy. The market salad was good, had squash, goat cheese and pomegranate seeds (not bbq but really good), the broccolini was also cooked perfect (it was the veggie of the day). We also had the pulled pork sandwich which again, was tasty. The sauce was a mixture of spicy and tangy. We also are a big fan of the cornbread they serve and don't forget to get your warm bag of donuts on the way out (you'll regret it in a good way).

U4SUDuZd0fYtmJWltCdRZg.text: I was visiting from out of town and craving bbq when I found this restaurant. Boy oh boy it did not disappoint!! This is one of my favorite bbq spots I've ever been to and I live in Georgia. Everything we had was delicious and every time I've come back to Scottsdale I stop here now. The pulled pork was so good! Not a lot of fat and the sauce and cornbread really took it up a notch! Definitely recommend this place!!

HI9A5cELjcG379P782RqEw.text: The amount of times that I've requested to go here for dinner is ridiculous. You'd think that there weren't any other restaurants in the area the way I rave about Bobby Qs. Everything from the atmosphere (absolutely beautiful interior) to the drinks (try the Princess Peach) is top notch. I feel I have the credentials to judge BBQ as a Missouri girl and former vegetarian, and their meat is out of this world. True fall-off-the-bone, slow cooked, made with love smoked meat. Oh, and the sides are all so damn yummy you can never order just one without serious FOMO. I highly suggest coming here with several people so you can order your top choice side dish and then convince a friend to order something else, like say your second choice side, so you can secretly have a few bites of theirs too.

FYCAUhc6-0j87JadjmNAgg.text: First time at Bobby Q's, my boyfriend had been to another location. Food was great, server was attentive. And I really enjoyed the atmosphere. When I had questions, the server or manager was able to answer quickly. BTW the coleslaw was AMAZING.

zU7Gve79WgC_QVhN6Y4BrA.text: Brunch was AMAZING!! We've been here a lot for dinner and now that brunch just started this will be a regular spot for us. The food is delicious and the service is always great! Highly recommend!

5JsxERQIzVVAcCzncBYpMg.text: Pretty fancy for a BarBQ joint ( This IS Biltmore lol). Same wonderful BobbyQ's food. Great service a wonderful bar and bar tenders. Sat at the bar and we shared a 3 meat platter. Beef and pork ribs and chicken. The Broccolini is a really tasty side!!  Can't wait to return.

photos.caption: Photo of Bobby Q - Biltmore - Phoenix, AZ, United States

3i2vD8BKawP4FqVNVQ6jww.text: This is a wonderful place to come to and enjoy delicious food. The staff is very attentive and friendly. My server was Colton and he was awesome. I travel quite a bit for work and when I'm in Phoenix I always make a point to come to Bobby Q-Biltmore. I will definitely be back and bring my coworkers again!!!!

AqhIJm7faqRy1UNMoZkI8Q.text: Kansas was the best! This place is so ridiculously good #drool The prime rib was to die for and the drinks, omg!

1jNjFAO_n_qVzv3MZ7pSYw.text: Had brunch great food and service ate on the patio great atmosphere.Would recommend  this to anyone looking for a weekend brunch.

mPH-nfIJzdzAnWudb6VW7w.text: Came for the first weekend that they started serving brunch and it was absolutely delicious! My husband ordered the eggs rancheros and I had an acai bowl and Bobby Q did not disappoint! We love their I17 location and this location has the same feel and atmosphere. We will be coming back!!

mGt90CPH5WQVs4_qesaUWA.text: Good food, service on the day I was in was a little slow. Left here with a full stomach and a bag of mini donuts. Nice seating area outside, and with a nice cocktail you can't go wrong. Will come back for sure

tlleXXUQoLByjBndmG0K8g.text: I love Bobby Q. I have officially been to all three locations here in the valley. I'll have to say both the biltmore and north Phoenix locations are my favorite. I feel like the Mesa location is not up to par like the others. I always split the full rack of baby back ribs. They are delicious and fall right off the bone! I also love their Mac and cheese!

FddGCHLoGDMlaJUXeNwSvg.text: Was tempted to give five stars because of the great service of the manager and staff here. We always frequent the main branch where we've had the best BBQ, here the food is still good, but it cannot compare to the main branch. Service is amazing, and so are the cornbread and donuts.

u6_Vl_uAf1bRFcjqYajXWA.text: Very cute restaurant! Smelled AMAZING as soon as I opened the door!!! Went last night for the first time and wasn't disappointed. Great menu, tried the "Q rolls, spinach dip, pecan cole slaw, Mac and cheese and chicken wings" all of which were fantastic! Great drink menu as well! The restaurant itself is dimly lit and very cute! Service was wonderful! Definitely will be back for the late night menu which looked awesome!

sQkfFRm47t2tnqhOaN_rTA.text: Wow first off the BBQ is good, really good. The portion sizes are HUGE! We got the whole hog which is basically whole portions of each meat with three sides. It says it could feed one or two but honestly it could easily feed 4. The meat was fall off the bone and smoked to perfection. I've eaten a lot of BBQ but am by no means an expert. I do think this is more consistent with what you would expect from a sweeter Kansas style or St. Louis BBQ with a liberal amount of moisture and sauce. The huge beef ribs are not a dry bbq, but are also generously sauced. All the sides were great. We had the should string friends (addictive!), mac and cheese, roasted corn, broccolini, and cole slaw. All were solid and delicious. We also had a kale salad and the q rolls not realizing how the portions were. Both were also excellent. The food came out quickly and service was friendly. Don't forget to eat the cornbread and donuts!

Lxn-Mh5dUFQpA-3cpZbqdA.text: I went here for the first time. Ordered a pulled pork sandwich, was too drunk to actually eat the sandwich from prior activities that day. Microwaved the sandwich for leftover when I woke up the next day.....was still the best pulled pork sandwich i have ever eaten.

0IKeKTbqtcbUIrw9xrlVgQ.text: I never thought I'd find amazing BBQ in Arizona but lemme tell ya, this place has it. They got an appetizer called Q-Rolls and they are FANTASTICALLY DELICIOUS! Our waitress recommended them and I second her recommendation. I had a half back of ribs with Mac and fries which was amazing as well. This isn't just fall off the bone ribs it's you pick up the rib and the meat stays in place and the bone just slides out ribs, perfection . Let's not forget the cornbread that was perfectly moist and sweet. The atmosphere was pretty amazing too, great decor!  Not to mention the little churro like doughnuts that are SOOO good. There wasn't one thing worth complaining about beside the fact that I walked in with a flat stomach and walked out looking six months pregnant and have been waddling since.

DVl8DxKFBufNGoPD-JIosQ.text: Delish !   So good.   I am glad Bobby Q's moved to Camelback in Phoenix.     I look forward to going there.    Been there 6 times and love their bar b q and the sauce they use on the meat.    There were 3 of us the other day for lunch and service was so good and so was the food.  The owner is there a lot and really cares about his customers .

O2Ohy-5YT0SjJlY0CrpAjA.text: Great service!  Joe and Aimee took great care of us.  This is my first time at this location. Same great food with an added bonus: personalized service since this restaurant is much smaller.  We had the Whole Hog Heaven and had left overs for my parents.

SEtJGQODauip-X8rx9GyYQ.text: One word Fantastic!!!! I've been eating at the location off the 17 frwy for years, but live around the corner to this awesome new location. The food here is always good, from the barbecue, to the steaks, including the fresh ground burgers. My favorite burger is the smoke house with a side of pecan coleslaw. This new restaurant has be designed perfectly, a great place for date night. The service has been great each time I have visited, this place is must for great casual dining.

VMKI21PcUxdUQo4RbM1lEw.text: The only complaint I have about this place is there was no warning about how damn full I would get. They need to have a dark, cool room to digest after eating, because the food coma is real. EVERYTHING about this place was world class. From the greeting at door, the ambiance, the great service from Ricky and Lauren and the FOOD. Some of the best BBQ I've ever had! Will definitely make this a regular place when we visit Arizona!

aWInSOc2Sa2p-DaOtFwt8w.text: My daughter and I went there for dinner on Labor Day. We had been planning on it for over a week. We decided to try the wings and were disappointed. The presentation was beautiful but the wings were so hot from being fried and I have never had such tough wings, definitely not worth the price. We couldn't eat them. Our dinners arrived way to quickly so we couldn't even try the wings until they cooled off. The brisket was not as good as past visits. The service was good.

nLgDwLBe613Fb8e6-fMb0A.text: Reduced menu compared to other locations and not a lot of seating but still great quality food and great atmosphere.

oRp5NJNrS4G5x26Wn_WaeA.text: Great ambience and fantastic food! Don't let the strip mall location fool you! Charming restaurant with an array of foods. Chilled plates for the salads a nice touch, Brisket was incredible and the Q rolls a must. Service was great too. We will be back soon!

F2ep1ZkcUfl4bo5Ncf93RQ.text: Great food, amazing ribs, best I've ever had. Service is impeccable every visit, every location.

EiUSBuHvEVbXJ7sXJ2Dthw.text: Horrible, it smelled like vomit. The meat seemed rancid. Prices were way too high. The BBQ sauce tasted like piss.

_ahPRuBhpGEcrwOmFdkd1Q.text: Excellent food but our waiter Dimitri was a real gem! He's worth his weight in gold. Q rolls , corn bread and sampler plate was delicious. Raspberry sangria was great

DMXONsYdCLpoiQQOWPEhlQ.text: Great barbecue spot in the Biltmore area! Had the pulled pork sandwich and the smokehouse burger, both of which were great. The cornbread and doughnuts are a nice touch and delicious!

_1fqeJZWl27NZIeBtX6Buw.text: Aside from the decor being a bit interesting for a BBQ establishment the food was legit! Being a designer I had a hard time associating the environment with the menu design, but enjoyed my experience!

XibcbSJDHwVrBFXMlFsJ_g.text: Amazing food! But even better service, super friendly. The portions were big! Definitely will be coming back! I got the Full Baby Back Ribs, and the meat literally fell off the bone

92Zn8r5mdhUiiDMlxcgznQ.text: Was in the other night and had such a great experience. Our server Krista was exceptional and very friendly. She made great suggestions as I wanted to try something new after visiting their other location not to long ago. I love the decor, food was great as usual. Our server really gave outstanding service I hope to sit in her section again. Perfect location, just what the neighborhood needed.

Br3NYh-ScZw5ISZd1Cl1Tg.text: Great food! Great atmosphere! Great fun! Our food was amazing. Colton, our server, was professional and timely.

TWwhmu4BEKXoq-py-iLfwg.text: four of us were trying to get together for lunch during the week I shut down in the summer. I wanted Bobby Q for no reason other than I had not had one of their excellent burgers in a long time. The one person from the East valley didn't want to make the drive to the original one and the rest of didn't want to drive to the one on Stapley. So we chose this one in spite of the fact it is hard to tell on line if the menu and pricing is the same as the other 2 locations, they are. Be prepared to notice how small this location is in comparison. We got there just as they opened and they were just about full up when we left. They do have a patio with misters  that is shaded on the West from the afternoon sun. Lunch time in July I am sure it only sees use as a last resort.  And yes, I did get a burger and mac and cheese which were just as good as I remembered from the original location. The service was also good.

_l2zOUfk3kUpgEiWSRag6Q.text: Always a good meal.  Finally made my way to the Bobby Q on east Camelback Road, after having dined at the original Bobby Q on I-17 dozens of times.  Bobby Q (Biltmore) is tucked away in the shopping center and  the atmosphere at Bobby Q's is great, and like there counter part the food is always exceptional.    On this visit we ordered the BBQ pork, BBQ chicken, BBQ beef brisket sandwiches and coleslaw.  I have to admit I have never been a fan of coleslaw but the coleslaw at Bobby Q is to die for and the meats, lean, flavorfull, and tender.  The service at Bobby Q is always exceptional. Our server checked in on us often but wasn't intrusive. They made sure we had everything we wanted and that our meal was enjoyable.  If you're ever in the neighborhood give him a try you won't be disappointed.

SnWv-niqrLy08CIiLpS8Gw.text: Yum BBQ, and bbq sauce is gluten free! Mixed ribs, mashed potaoes and brussel sprouts with bacon, absolutely, perfect! Good service! Really enjoyed ourselves.

photos.caption: Photo of Bobby Q - Biltmore - Phoenix, AZ, United States. Thank you, David!

vEx6kzqBQeyWIAoq58HFHA.text: Cane here with the fam bam on a quiet Thursday night. There is plenty of parking in the plaza. The place is pretty casual with an inside and an outside patio sitting area. The staff was friendly and they always made sure we had everything we needed. There were 5 adults in my group and we decided to go for the Whole hog heaven: you get to pick 2 ribs, 2 other meats and 3 sides. We went for the baby back and beef ribs, brisket, chicken and baked potato, broccolini and fries for our sides.  Overall the food was pretty good. We were all hungry and there was definitely enough meat for everyone.  I especially liked the fall of the bone baby back ribs and the smokey brisket. Chicken was pretty good tho it could have used a tad bit less sauce.  The only "downside" I guess would be that the side dishes were pretty small in size even if we had 3 for 5 people. The broccolini were so yummy but there wasn't enough for everyone.  Good choice for bbq cravings!

photos.caption: Photo of Bobby Q - Biltmore - Phoenix, AZ, United States. Whole hog heaven! 5 hungry adults can eat it all

tvQW9iSvieojF5Dnndlm4A.text: Great food, fast service, extremely friendly environment, I'm very happy we stopped at this place during the road trip. I was originally going to another place in gilbert but decided on visiting somewhere new. The food was delicious, definitely worth trying. Great BBQ!

photos.caption: Photo of Bobby Q - Biltmore - Phoenix, AZ, United States. The three meat combo. Everything was delicious

OJ3SOTSNdVqvDIUtNv8e1A.text: Enjoyed the atmosphere they got really tasty pulled pork sandwich's highly recommended this place it's so good :)

eYExZWJ3lANFzBGAy5xPew.text: Kristi and Grace made a wonderful dinner experience at Bobby Q - Biltmore location at 32nd St and Camelback, Phoenix, AZ. The hot cornbread, brisket, brocollini, and fresh miniature donuts were outstanding. The people here are as wonderful as the food!

KYtAbquTXzNr5IfWKYQDYA.text: Ate here at the advice from our local work peers and the Yelp reviews. The location we went to is in Strip mall and the parking was limited. Nice retro feel with brick walls and plated ceilings. Our waiter was very friendly and offered suggestions. I had the brisket sandwich with Mac and Cheese. The brisket was dry, and needed a lot of sauce to make it enjoyable but their house BBQ sauce was really good! My work peers really enjoyed the ribs and pulled pork. I tried the ribs and agreed. The Mac and Cheese was creamy but I have had better. I will give them another try when I return next month.

H8yVNx1Gsr8esjw6o45JRg.text: Great food. The waiter is super friendly. Spicy BBQ sauce is amazing. Got the cornbread to take away too.

JcxGo5o6fkLtLQiPwsta_g.text: Let me just say that BBQ is not one of my most favorite meals.... however, Bobby Q's? This place is fabulous! I thoroughly the delicious pulled and moist pulled pork, terrific cornbread, and the bread pudding was amazing! I truly cannot wait to return!

ARxY5ENdWHQ5HJRZHu9z3A.text: Great F-Day lunch. $15 champagne for mimosas was great! Thanks for a nice afternoon. Our server was on top of everything. Baby back ribs were the bomb!

3cwsT5jO8Ul9c1ENiPnFBw.text: Such a treat, from the greeting at the door, to the wonderful service from Ashlyn our server, we had a wonderful meal and evening. The food was soo good, (beef ribs, brisket, pulled bbq chicken with the yummy sides-Mac and cheese, homemade mashed potatoes and a baked potato almost too pretty to eat!) the yearly craving for great bbq has been satisfied! Thanks again to Ashlyn who made the evening sparkle!

h6lpln7Vu6fMipueglsoKg.text: Worth checking it out - and I'll return. Easy to find, park, and plenty of variety in seating from patio to bar to dining room. Great attentive but not overbearing service. Very good food, ribeye cooked just right for medium rare.

photos.caption: Photo of Bobby Q - Biltmore - Phoenix, AZ, United States. Great seat to enjoy the games, good food and great service.

ZSRxpV1kFcy_omlj2xWV0A.text: Not a Family Friendly place! If you have a baby-infant or a toddler- May be reasonable to stay away from this restaurant.  Something did NOT FEEL RIGHT  today.  Visited the place today with my husband and two kids- infant and a toddler.  Meat did fall off the bone. Salad was innovative and interesting  Kids were busy and quiet in the beginning. Then they had a moment of crying. It did last a few minutes.  Immediately, An employee approached our table and asked us in a very respectful way if there is anything she could do to help us with the kids.  She said she was concerned about the rest of the customers...  Very interesting approach.  An hour earlier our kids laughed and cried at the lobby of the Phoenician hotel for an hour. Employees and guests stopped by with joy to say hello to our kids.  It does not seem right...., right?  Kids will be kids. One minute they cry and one minute they laugh.   At Bobbi-Q instead of focusing on the customers that complain, they will focus on your baby's crying...  One thing for sure - while families with kids customers may not be the future of Bobby-B, kids are the future of every nation, including ours....

oC-pOdVzba8zkhVJXCB8vQ.text: I would recommend trying this place, but for me it was just OK. I'm so jaded about BBQ having spent almost 50 years in KC that what other people think is great is just average for me. One thing to note before going is the spare ribs, which True BBQ aficionados prefer to baby backs, are fattier and therefore more flavorful, at the Phoenix location are not on the menu here. We had pulled pork, brisket and baby backs. The BBQ sauce did not appeal to my palette nor did the dry rub. I would ask not to sauce the meat before serving. The pecan coleslaw was a welcome novelty. The baked beans were again just adequate. The free donuts were delicious and our waiter gave us a free bread pudding to take home for my companion's birthday, thanks Devin.  Taste, especially in food and doubly so about BBQ is subjective so I thought I would add my companion's comment. She said the pulled pork, really smoky, was the best she has had since coming to Phoenix over 18 years ago.

DAo8BnOyYP3A-TsM9oe7mQ.text: Well it was our first time at Bobby Q for lunch. They have come to my workplace to advertise and handed out coupons. We weren't planning on lunch so I forgot my coupons- next time! The service was very welcoming and friendly. Dana made sure we had drinks and that our choices were the proper size for our appetite. My friend had a salad that looked delicious & fresh! I had BBQ platter to try 3 types of meat...it was fantastic as well. The macaroni and cheese was okay (I love a good Mac & Cheese) bit the sauce tasted a bit processed...not bad- but not memorable either. I had a delicious cocktail as well! The lunch was a bit spendy $50 including tip, but it's a pleasant atmosphere & service is nice so money well spent!

pirR-KEGNtbYMdNvePnIvw.text: Had a wonderful meal.   Would recommend anyone come here for barbeque.   Our waiter was Hunter and service was great.

qpE72juB_hnjQ1x4BLqIQg.text: Came on a Sunday night at 8pm. Great service and delicious food & drinks. Server was very attentive and we enjoyed sitting in the outdoor area. Definitely coming back. Free corn bread also a nice treat.

ydbUI2A_l3DBoB-tXPODzw.text: Great addition to the camelback east neighborhood. We were missing a great barbecue spot, and I think this is it!  The pulled pork and short ribs are so tender.. the Q rolls are a must appetizer... and also very reasonably priced drafts($6).  Also to note the entrees are quite hefty so the two meat combination platters are plenty to share for two.

Y0UJCb1xVXxbC0NJ6dPqow.text: Oh so happy!  This location is small but it lives up to the standard.   Menu seems smaller. But portions are priced appropriately.  Fast, friendly service.  Get the beef brisket. Well prepared.

U-qAfm5rutijXHh3CJD1aA.text: Sooooo much food, and sooooo tasty. A little heavy on the sauce for my liking but fellow members of the party had no complaints at all. The staff are super friendly and helpful. The venue is very comfortable. Everything about Bobby Q made for an excellent night out.

MDFKWlyB4aTryn6mQibnnA.text: Woah baby this is good BBQ! I have to admit that I am not a big fan of bbq, I have to be in the right mood...but Bobby Q is delicious!   We heard from a friend about this new spot and decided to try it while the family was in town for the holidays. We ordered for pick up and it was all ready to go at the time we asked for (for some reason this can be challenging for some places). We ordered brisket, half chicken, hot links, buns, coleslaw, and mashed potatoes. When we got it home we realized there was only one small cup of sauce for all of us, but we didn't even need it. The meats were so good and flavorful that any extra sauce would have taken away from it. Everything was cooked to perfection with just the right amount of fat that melted in your mouth with each bite. The hot links were more mild than hot, and the mashed potatoes were good but nothing to write home about. Everything else however was stellar. The coleslaw and brisket were quite possibly the best I've ever had. The buns were not necessary either, the meat spoke for itself. Clearly Bobby Q is doing it right! I'm anxious to try some of their other delicacies sometime soon. Even though I'm not a big bbq fan you can be sure I'll be a regular at this place. I highly recommend checking it out for yourself.

-3DrKscpJ1eTSU80ZPUoBA.text: Glad that there is a decent BBQ place in my neighborhood.  Daughter treated me to dinner here and I went with the Brisket Sandwich.  Meat was tender, juicy, flavorful and the Brioche bun was fresh.  As happens at the other Bobby Q, cornbread is served, and when you depart, mini-donuts accompany you.  Yeah, I think I'm gonna be back.  soon.

qEvv8CUQ9nDO3khhAUqA3g.text: had lunch here today. Their al pastor tacos are awesome. They come with two sauce types!

E1lx96SDIF2FHenXmAx-yA.text: We have been in Phoenix on vacation for 4 days now and this is by far the tastiest restaurant we have been to so far. The brisket and pulled pork were delicious and tender. The brussel sprouts were AH-MAZING! The kids LOVED the corn bread! The waitress was super friendly, portions were sizable and they even gave us hot towels when we were finished. Hot Donuts were sent home a mini doggie bag. Highly recommend this place, all 4 of us loved it!

gPoNA1YeT3adwmnQlSAJaA.text: We catered bobby q for our wedding! We love it so much! We are big BBQ fans & this is the best! Cutest location as well! Cute bar with lights and the best service!!

bjcjXrgXy9Wh9F12ao1jkg.text: Ashlyn was amazing and super attentive!! The food was delectable and atmosphere was so chill!! A must visit location!! The princess peach was to die for!!!

RtTIyQsKIaR5XAwcGFe_Ug.text: The food was great.   Service was awesome.  We met an old friend for dinner and we sat and enjoyed the dinner while we talked the night away.  We will be back soon.

M1FxH6gUv3SrTSZwBK1-6g.text: Every time we come here the service is on point and the food is delicious.  This place has become a regular place for me and my fiance.    Great drinks.  Great food.  You won't be disappointed by going in.  Keep up the great work Bobby Q!

nwSRGZLCYZgwIKwA8vqzHw.text: We tried this place 2 weeks ago, take out on a Sunday night and loved it !  We split a whole rack of the baby back ribs which were tender and meaty, no fat in sight.    Then . .  this past Sunday night we did a repeat and they were horrible, so I guess it's hit and miss.   One third  of the ribs was a mass of congealed meat and most of the ribs were full of fat!  I picked the meat off the bones, discarded the fat and tendons, and put it in a salad the next day.   We agreed we need a different agenda on Sunday nights, too dicey to order these ribs again;  so disappointing.      The cornbread is great, as is the coleslaw with pecans on top.   The shoestring potatoes were okay, and we tried the potato salad, but we really just like a big salad and the ribs.   Too bad, because we were at Mexx 32 all the time and loved it, and miss that place, especially because we could take our (well-behaved)  dog on the patio.    The bar looks like a 'happening' place, but the ribs were a downer this last time.   Need better quality control.

S37Z5fOKUyIFLdP8fmccwQ.text: Bobby Q is always a go to. Especially with the amazing menu options. Love that the Biltmore location has the Q-bowls!

2t6WcxTPjjJSGOcnQ8MG6Q.text: Food was outstanding. Ate the smoked prime rib.   Thw service was even more exceptional!!!!

BMH_A5MjO3qfHUafCRhJ1g.text: Ribs were amazing Mac and cheese was decent  Food portions are generous. Complimentary donuts are a nice touch. Service was better than most bbq establishments I am a fan of this location, not too busy or crowded before it turns into a 'club scene' like the location off the I-17.   Overall my favorite bbq spot in the Biltmore area.

ZIvo4scJJCwt_s4iHw0gUA.text: Okay so Bobby Q really deserves 3.5 stars food wise, but I will round it up to 4 because of the overall experience. As suggested by most reviews we started our meal with the q rolls. My oh my, everyone is right because they were phenomenal! Tender, juicy brisket wrapped into a crunchy roll. An awesome American twist to the traditional spring roll. There was 3 adults and 2 children in our party so we decided to order the whole hog consisting of: beef ribs, pork ribs and brisket. The meat was overall good, but maybe a little bit too tender for my liking. Obviously they have to cook this ahead of time, but I could tell it did not come directly off the grill/smoker. We did really enjoy the variety of sauces they offer especially the "Q-a-lina." If you are in a party of 4, the whole hog option is way to go. Service was prompt and friendly. Classy interior with a beautiful entrance filled with plants along the bar area. I also love the fact they have complimentary corn bread to start and donuts to end the meal. Not sure if I'll be back, but the least I can do is write them a good review. If I come back, it'll definitely be for the q rolls!

SZI6NBYgYiWApkVEvH0VYA.text: Great food and service!  I was in town for the weekend and found this place close to the hotel, glad I did!  The brisket and ribs were outstanding, our server was on the money. I'll be back the next time I'm in town.

G-5qF0Dhf2NCdAS4JPNLYg.text: Yum!!! 5 stars! My husband and I had previously been to the original location but saw this one was opened closer to us (in place of the previous restaurant, Mexx 32).   The BBQ is 100% as consistent as the original location. Fall off the bone ribs, pork and brisket extremely tender.  Great service and atmosphere. Our server was kind and attentive (didn't catch his name but we were a table of 5 at around 5pm today in a booth by the bar). He was training another employee. The blonde manager who came over was so sweet.  Overall great experience! Everyone ordered something different and we all loved our food. True BBQ spot.

05izXBDWnsVSxFPpJKLDgQ.text: Place is cramped, horrible seating.  This place is not as nice as original, do not understand why Bathroom sink is outside bathroom, it spreads more germs, because people touch handles inside & outside,awful. Food is great, that is all

rAlvV2_zlPcQGOZlzwkS9g.text: I love coming in at least twice a week for the awesome happy hour and incredible service! The food is always amazing and I've never once had a bad experience!

W8h2km4z2isdFUmBhRsx6w.text: Natalie was an awesome server!  Beef ribs and brisket so tasty!!!!!  And one of the best old fashioneds around!!!!!!!

eNofi8ps5NMy24LgD9SC6Q.text: Bobby Q always delivers with great food and top flight service; Natalie did an amazing job on my last visit. My go-to place for ribs, great appetizer options and sides.

TtWopTS3VOka7L6FBR6ZvA.text: We had an AMAZIng meal and an AMAZing server.  Natalie was exceptional! I highly recommend happy hour on a Saturday afternoon dining on the patio! Food was phenomenal!

X73bqdm7nnqqgIVOHGiPhQ.text: Very disappointing.  Ribs were gritty. Salad dressing bad.  Pulled chicken sandwich was ordinary.  Never again.

8ZI8NIzvBC-mM5Gcg9rRBA.text: We had a wonderful brunch experience here and it was their first weekend open for brunch! Shoutout to our great server, Michael! Really nice menu with some different offerings from the usual.

Z9yz9WLEWXfj6fcHaQ1ltA.text: Bobby-Q's just one upped themselves!! I didn't think it possible but I like this locations more than any other I have been to. My BFF and I decided to check out this new location not long ago and it was the most adorable place. I'm going to call it a Boutique version of their other 2 restaurants. Something a little more upscale. This locations also offers different craft cocktails, new menu items and an even more gorgeous patio if thats possible. I ended up getting my usual Q-sticks and Mac-n-Cheese because I just cant help myself. Everything was just as tasty as their other locations. I hope to see more of these smaller fun locations around the Valley. Great concept.

l-Pu-FvKK77u_TjXT9HQbg.text: Everything tasted great. The bbq egg rolls were amazing, and the reason I came. Nice waiter. Will definitely come back on more dates.

1IIdzTWz3S0xs_bHTfzj_Q.text: Favorite restaurant in AZ! Great service & great food. Make sure to get the Q Rolls as an appetizer!

eAe57Meu2o3UcOWrwq5f7Q.text: Great seat, fast service and tasty unique Q-food! After a long day in the sun we found this place to take the family. Very nice spot for families, easy parking and all around really great food. Kids loves the ribs, the brisket was soft and smoky while the beer was cold and refreshing.

RawGmW7C4XelqsSOkniwqg.text: Went here on a Friday evening around 7/8. The staff was very pleasant and attentive. We were able to get a table in 10-15 minutes. They give you free cornbread to start (which is amazing). They then explain the menu to you in detail (if you ask). I got the 2 meat platter which was enough food for 2 people. The baby back ribs were amazing and fell right off the bone. The brisket was also delicious. I would definitely recommend going at least once. It is a little pricy but worth it.

R1JuMA3uNjfN3hwVL_bekw.text: Rachel was awesome! We were pleasantly surprised with the quality of food, service and atmosphere.....it exceeded ALL our expectations.  The cocktail menu is the bomb!!

DxUFZZ-uCyamMjBjhE1Sdw.text: As always Bobby Q's doesn't disappoint - tonight all three of us had the ribeye and it was cooked perfectly.  I went with the Brussel sprouts and they were amazing.  The service is always great and they really know how to make you feel at home.  Bobby Q's is a must when you are looking for great food and a relaxing environment!

tgTYxQhhPSIZRcGtaSqVFw.text: I placed an order with them using GrubHub. We waited past the  expected wait time for our food to be delivered. When it did arrive, it was missing items. I called the restaurant; they insisted that they had placed all the items in the bag and and that their workers are trained to double check orders. Someone clearly screwed up, because we ended up with cornbread, which wasn't even part of the order. They made me call GrubHub. GrubHub called the driver and the restaurant. After they got back in touch with me, they told me that the restaurant had refused to issue a refund. I paid $44 for two cold sandwiches with no sides and a garden salad and three pieces of cornbread I didn't ask for that showed up 10 minutes outside of the delivery window. I will never order from Bobby Q again. And I have serious reservations about using GrubHub in the future.

lM8jv0OMDB-NLWYq5OY5dg.text: my family and i love this place soo much. the food is a a. the fries are the best at this restaurant. don't miss this rest

OcEHuqmLk-sj5-AUNRNvng.text: Brandon is the man. First time here been to two other Bobby qs. Same great food and service. Donuts!

TedAwppXPu8vS8jIoyc4Bw.text: This is top 2 BBQ joints in the VALLEY!  Hands down! The service is excellent! The BBQ is AMAZING! If you're a fan of cheesy Mac & Cheese that is balanced with the pasta, you must try it here. Sunday is a great family night to come Family Feast special is dollar for dollar worth it. The only thing missing is Shiner Bock to go with the fall off the bones ribs. If your a BBQ fan you know what I am talking about! Enjoy! Cheers!

dwiy6NVRyVn4_339cY1LIw.text: For a First time visit  Bobby Q's did not disappoint! It was a Friday night so we decided to call ahead for reservations. We sat in the first booth beyond the bar and it was the best seat in the house. Our server, Christa, was right on top of things and had a great personality to go with her excellent service!  My husband asked about the coleslaw and she offered to bring him a sample which was a great idea. We all had barbecue and it was fantastic. You can't go wrong with a fun night at BobbyQ's.

2XHvmDA1P_gvKvqtFrqWUQ.text: Possibly the best bbq in the valley, Bobby Qs is the real deal. No wonder yelp gave it a top 100 rating. The brisket is outstanding but honestly you can't go wrong with any other type of meat. The Mac and cheese is a hit as well. Will definitely come back again

GpH4Wdjf5flTrcF8WuUU4w.text: I don't see how anyone could give this place less than 5 stars. I'm 57 years  old & have eaten a lot of BBQ, but Bobby Q's is by and far THE BEST ever. The service, the ambiance, and the food, oh, the food. Simply wonderful! Looking forward to trying the other location just to see if perfection can be duplicated. Yes, it's expensive, way expensive. But damn, is it good!

OdX_WKM8AgIACAuKvrRJyw.text: We found this place on Google (we were travelling from Ohio) and with such positive reviews, we couldn't resist.   We didn't realize until we got there that there's three locations and the Phoenix and Mesa locations share a menu while the Biltmore location on Camelback has another menu. It was fine but there were a couple things on the menu that we were looking forward to but they didn't have. However, none of that mattered because the food was crazy good!  It took 10 minutes for someone to greet us once we were seated, and once the manager, Joanna, asked if we had been waited on, she apologized profusely, got someone to help us right away and offered to comp a starter and dessert. She also apologized later and said that their goal is to greet within two minutes and it was unacceptable. The way they made it right (by the way, it wasn't a big deal because the ambiance and awesome breeze on the patio had us feeling so comfortable) along with the food and service so made up for any wrongdoing! I will definitely be coming back!  We started with the Q Rolls and they were okay, the brisket was a bit tough for my liking but my friend loved them. I then got the Babyback Half Rack with macaroni and cheese and pecan cole slaw. The ribs fell off the bone and was so tender, the sauce was perfect, sweet and tangy. The mac and cheese was divine and the server, Aimee, said it was really good, but being a mac and cheese snob made me skeptical. She was telling the truth! It was creamy and simple, just as it should be to complement everything else. The cole slaw was good - cream based, which is my preference. They just put a few chopped pecans on top so I don't know if I would've called it "pecan cole slaw," but it was good nonetheless. The cornbread was amazing as well!  We didn't take advantage of the free dessert because we were "Thanksgiving full" but that didn't stop us from trying their complimentary cocaine, I mean cinnamon, donuts because of the reviews. Hot and hypnotic!

XxlS6OBJ4qBSi5aGybhsZg.text: Bobby Q's cocktails are out of this world. I've only tried princess peach, coconut lime mojito, and the q-loha but all of them were great. I can't even pick a favorite.   The food.. Q-rolls are amazing. I love brisket and the sauce they are served with is soo good. One order comes with 6 rolls so they're definitely shareable.   On  another visit, we came for the late night menu and had brisket tacos. Amazing. I don't think you could order anything bad from the place. The ribs are good, the brisket is good, Mac and cheese is amazing.   We were even given cornbread before our meal and freshly made donuts for dessert!!   Definitely come hungry because the portions are huuuuge. I never thought BBQ could be classed up but Bobby Q's did it. The environment at the restaurant is nice and the patio is great at night.   Definitely recommend for cocktails, food, and as a date night spot!

AtVpi0ThYwKIseYO0Aef9g.text: This was my first time at this restaurant, and it is also my last. I love barbecue, but I hate fat. I thought by ordering the ribs, I would stand the best chance to have lean meat. That just wasn't so. these are not the kind of ribs that you pick up, but rather when you can find the meat you need to eat it with a fork. There was so much fat, and so much bone, that finding the meat was a chore. Maybe the food at their original location is better, but, except for the delicious cornbread, I would not recommend this location.

_pAEDxXY6bV8JE5E_MenqQ.text: This was our first time here.  Hailee is so sweet and welcoming! Laura, the owner was so welcoming and genuinely happy to accommodate our party of 4. We sat on the patio which was very cool and cozy. The bartender Joe made great drinks and was so friendly. Our server, Brandon, couldn't have been better... so patient, friendly and truly there to give us great service! The food was delicious with ample portions. We had the Yardbird Rotisserie Chicken with Delicious Brussels Sprouts and baked potato and they even split it for us, the ribs were falling off the bone and melted in our mouths, street tacos were excellent. We will definitely be coming back when we're in town... totally worth it and so Fun!

M7OrjTcJMIz1ysA4OD9JKA.text: My family went here for Mother's day and wow!! This place is very good. I made a reservation a few days prior and for being Mother's day they were busy but we were seated right away. The portions are big, my boyfriend and I split a 3 meat plate and still had left overs. The brisket is soo good, as well as the sausage. The Mac & cheese is creamy and full of flavor. Our waiter was very nice and didn't mind explaining the menu to us either. I will definitely be coming back here.

rcrtnxrHmhF5TDaLfzDrkg.text: This place is great! Love the ribs here. The environment is pretty good too with a delicious smoke smell.

XCFtE4j_1XMCWFa4C1aAkg.text: First time here and we are definitively adding this to our list of go to places when we're here in Phoenix. Our host/server was Kansas and she was nothing short of amazing!  Welcoming, tons of information, and just plain lovely. Gary's ribs were the best he's had in years. Fall off the bone tender. My brisket was equally tender and scrumptious. Hands down 5 stars.

chjaHncaQRJ5DBFHKpxuRQ.text: I was at Bobby Q on October 4th I have have to say that this instantly become of my favorite restaurants. The staff was awesome helpful and attentive. They really knew the menu and made the best options for cocktails and dinner. The suggestion was the whole hog and I must say it was perfect the beef ribs hands down the best I've had in years. On top of that most restaurants do not offer beef ribs. So to have them and done well was a treat. The sausage was second to none and the portions were shocking to the point it was more food then I expected. I could keep going but if you read this go you won't be disappointed.

9nT6WTsnib9j0o9Zkv2luQ.text: I was really afraid to write this review after going here for the first time so we went a second time. Now I feel very comfortable giving 5 stars. Let's start with the food, amazing ribs and brisket. The ribs literally fall off the bone and are so tender with such great flavor. The sauce is just the right amount of sweetness without being overwhelmingly spicy hot. We're outnumbered here in Arizona, we consider salt a spice and don't venture even to pepper much. Crazy, I know! I'm not a huge fan of cornbread but I would go back if they were out of everything and only had cornbread to serve. The serving sizes of everything ordered was generous.  The service was excellent both times we were there and we found the patio especially comfortable.  I thought I would never find great BBQ in Phoenix but I did and couldn't be happier. Thank you Bobby Q, I'll be a regular from now on.

fpjWDrXABNdZfmGO_k51Qw.text: Last night was my first time going here. In a fabulous location, so i knew the food would be pretty decent. We had a reservation and were immediately seated. I'm gluten free so I couldn't enjoy the complimentary corn bread or sugar donuts but the rest of the group really enjoyed them. I ordered the pulled pork sandwich (without a bun) and the thin fries. Both were delicious. I was excited they brought additional containers of BBQ sauce to the table, especially when one was spicy - but it was not spicy at all!! Even my husband who can't handle the heat agreed it was not spicy. It still tasted great though. It is a little higher end, but the quality makes it worth the price. I live quite far from this area but I will be back next time I make my way to Biltmore.

52xMaW2S_o4Vh3pd4yo9bw.text: Wasn't what I expected for all the high reviews. The broccoli Was too tough to chew, the cole slaw was average, and there was way too much meat in proportion to sides. Won't be going back

As a concierge, there is no missing service here. Staff including management (Joanna) have great inviting touch. A perfect steakhouse for who want to get off the old stubborn beaten-path.

8-w-mmk06VxyFzHCNORdtg.text: Fabulous food just like the "original" Bobby Q. We went to this location because it was closer and we were not disappointed. The restaurant is in a strip mall but has a cozy, heated outdoor patio with about 6 tables on it. The inside of the restaurant isn't very big so I would recommend a reservation.

DZDHCeNJ-2VAtLj6ZIeunw.text: Arrived in the rain Sat nite for our 9pm online reservation for 4 adults.  Easy to find by Delux; although the parking lot is busy, it was worth it.  Got a nice table right away, had very good service, and ordered some nice large cold beers - a special idk but were refreshing with bbq.  Got the Q rolls $12 to try - large order of 6 very good, filled with brisket, and complimentary corn bread and butter - yumm.  We ordered the Whole Hog Heaven  with ribs, brisket and pulled pork (coulda have tried sausage or chicken too) and extra bbq sauce on the side - plenty with leftovers for us 4 adults.  We got 3 sides - good pecan coleslaw, mac and cheese, and fries for dd.  Best ending was the complementary 8 donuts hot in a bag with sugar - easy to go if you ate too much bbq! total with 3 beers $92+tip.  Fun place and great food!

RgGKCATIBAyZQfSCsZI7yw.text: DO NOT MISS this delicious, friendly, cozy, cool restaurant!!! Perfect for locals and tourists, Bobby Qs is the epitome of exquisite and melt in your mouth BBQ!! Service was caring, attentive and efficient. Greeting was friendly and accommodating. Sauce is OFF THE HOOK! We took a big jug home for our summer cook outs. The patio was beautiful, comfy and sheltered with lovely hanging plants and terrific atmosphere. Music was uplifting and retro...we were singing along. The Q Rolls are a MUST!! You will not be disappointed!! Our kids love it too. :-)

LtkR8j0AqJ0Cpj-5IDC4pA.text: The food was exceptional, the drinks were just as great but honestly my favorite part was the service. Our waitress Aimee was amazing and also the the GM/ Owner, JoAnne!? Stopped by to ask how everything was. Love the atmosphere and ambience!

The lemonade was good. It was just my daughter and myself so they served us 2 plates, dividing the meal in 2, with 1 side on each plate. That was a great idea! The meal was delicious. The Mac n cheese was super cheesy! I would definitely return the next time I'm in Arizona. Oh yeah and the staff are friendly and attentive!

yF8JTmGoz0w94JTGm-aUTw.text: I went in for the first time a few weeks ago. I dined alone and sat in one of the booths at the bar area. I was greeted immediately by my server who suggested a wonderful cocktail -Peach something! I forgot the name. I ordered a ribeye and it was wonderful. The server checked on me too many times and offered to box my food when I was cutting into my steak. I would just suggest reading your guests a little better. ZSJDymPFqpGKkB4dnGvcGA.text: We were looking for good BBQ and got it, and more. The restaurant has a cool feel to it. Pros:  - Service was excellent, starting with the hostess who was super friendly and then the server was excellent. Everything came out promptly and correct. - Food was excellent. The corn bread they brought out early was amazing. We got the 3 meat BBQ platter and the chicken, pork and beef ribs were great. We didn't have room for dessert but they brought us out some take home mini-donuts. - prices were reasonable. Cons: None

aMngs37__z1R1OTMeJlNHw.text: BBQ doesn't leave me speechless often but wow! I came with a large group of family friends, this was the perfect environment to catch up and have a good time while eating great food. The briquet was incredible. Very tender and great flavor. We also had ribs, wings, pulled pork, and salads. We shared some sides around the table, some of our favorites were the Mac and cheese, Brussel sprouts and mashed potatoes. Although the food was amazing our waitress Kansas was even better for putting up with us all night!

oWIAY8xyf0OzfprmcEMshA.text: Let me tell ya, this is the new HOT SPOT for brunch! Natalie our server went above and beyond for us and recommended the greatest things on the menu! I had the lemon ricotta pancakes and they were out of this world!

JnQSiaHlcOqj5B24LHMKBw.text: This place is literally amazing. My boyfriend and I just recently moved to the area and have tried many of the different restaurants around town and this was one of the best. It's so rare to find a quality barbecue place in Phoenix as well, so this place was a really awesome find!! Good for all ages, definitely come whether you want to spend quality time with the family or just go out and have a good time. Seriously such a great place.

D_IJY0rBhU7eBTaP8QAWew.text: Good food and service.  Tip is to park in the back.  There is a back entrance door.  Our group has baby backs, beef ribs and the platter with brisket, pulled pork, baby backs and beef ribs.  All 4 of us could have shared the platter and sides.  It was that much food!  Just like the Mesa and I 17 locations, the donuts are a nice treat.   We had a bread pudding as a birthday treat.  One of the best bread puddings I have ever had.  We all shared and there was still left overs.   I think next time we will great a platter, and add dinner salads and we will be all smiles again.

QIcwUBKFEkzHAuAkbOJUvg.text: 04/12/2018  Bday Dinner  I was driving by the area & decided to stop by for dinner. We were greeted by a host and sat to table right away. The interior of restaurant is beautifully decorated and your able to see seek peek of kitchen. Server was quick and made food suggestions. The food arrived quickly and Everything seemed to be fresh made. We ordered the 3 meats with 3 sides & had plenty left overs. Cant wait to return & try something new in the menu.

OoZeSyXLPFljKWGfj9t-rA.text: This is by far my favorite Bobby Q location. Great atmosphere combined with an open patio setting leading to a chic bar with the Bobby Q style seen at the Phoenix location leads to a great brunch and date location. Top it off with fall off the bone ribs and an excellent menu, and this location is guaranteed to please.

JGIygZQAwTx7FNbFARJDhg.text: Austin our server was fantastic and the food was delish! Pulled pork and Brisket were "melt in your mouth." Sat on the patio for a great experience. We will definitely return!

Himk5POOX7yrS5Xzn3r3wA.text: Great atmosphere.  Good food and service.  Completely enjoyed my visit!  I will be back!

xyVgyLLkORloArPG6k2-1Q.text: Brunch at Bobby Q's was fabulous on Easter Sunday. We all had a little bit of everything, the Pork Benedict & salmon toast had eight thumbs up. The lemon ricotta pancakes were unbelievable. The mimosas were tasty, we'll definitely be back and we won't wait till Easter.

photos.caption: Photo of Bobby Q - Biltmore - Phoenix, AZ, United States. Mimosas.

f-bxD5MriBkYzagZzEkEkQ.text: Loved it! The food was great and so was the service. We will definitely go back! We were able to make a reservation and everything was ready when we showed up! The manager also touched every table which I appreciated.

ztBfhrI-2GPV83joeE9_ng.text: This was our first visit and all we can say is 'wow!'  Great service from Ashlynn!  We have ribs and brisket which was perfectly prepared.  The sides were Mac and cheese and coleslaw - both delicious!  The best cornbread I've ever had!

tG5RoGuFBFmAqXN90lXpiw.text: Great server, beautiful interior, delicious food. Wish the bartender could have been a little more diligent getting out our orders. Will go back.

photos.caption: Photo of Bobby Q - Biltmore - Phoenix, AZ, United States

M4_0k7rM7aCU6xtzsG-uyQ.text: Slightly overpriced for the quality. It's a fun environment but our service was mediocre. There's definitely better BBQ around town.

3nkVlWt62SV2CbbdPTOweQ.text: My family is from Kansas City, so I have a high standard for BBQ. Luckily, Bobby Q didn't disappoint.  There isn't a ton of great BBQ in Phoenix, so I'm glad Bobby Q opened in my neighborhood. I ordered the baby back ribs, which were fall-off-the-bone delicious and my fiancee ordered the pulled pork sandwich, which was tender and dressed to perfection.  The sides are also great and BIG. Sharing is encouraged.   Cocktail menu is interesting. There are tons of unique drinks and each was photographed so you can basically point to the menu to order.  The donuts you get when you leave are also amazing. I didn't know what to think of the little to-go bag at first, but I couldn't stop eating them on the way home!

bX8mvC5kHca4sbQvFBo5cg.text: Family was in the mood for BBQ and our local favorite was closed, so gave Bobby Q a try.  I wasn't expecting to be impressed, and I wasn't. Maybe an off night, but found the food mediocre. Outside seating was comfortable (besides another table openly vaping).   Service was great and maybe the only reason I'd try again.

M8ZPTF_CAERa7_E3JPtqAQ.text: My partner and I went there for lunch today and it was an amazing first time experience there. The wait staff were so nice and friendly. The manager Laura came to our table and asked us how or meal was, it's not every day that the managers come to check up on the guest. It's a great place for lunch or dinner I highly recommend it Thank you to the wait staff and the manager for your hospitality. I know I will definitely keep coming back.

pUotyvXNgkaPsm4fo0vx6Q.text: This location is pretty good. Of course this is a smaller location so there are certain things that aren't on the menu. This place has potential.

IAJJpTONjXiMjDYNfv_EUA.text: Server Danny was above and beyond amazing. He was  very attentive with a great sense of humor. Very refreshing. Our glasses were never empty:) thank you Danny! The manager talked to us to make sure everything is up to par. I appreciate their desire to always be better and customer oriented.

gzuldyKriF_teB_xf3lwWQ.text: With all the hype, I was expecting something special. I consider myself a bit of a BBQ expert. Tried the place twice to make sure I just didn't get a bad night. Their meat is mushy, especially the pulled pork!! They may be soaking their meat in tenderizer, who knows?!? Unfortunately, this place is now off of my list

_mgKPD9U7RQwhohh6Gring.text: This is my husband and I's favorite BBQ, EVER! We tried the pulled chicken, ribs, hot links, fries, and macaroni & cheese. Everything we had tasted amazing! I never want to eat BBQ from anywhere else! Our server was kind, and the food came out quickly even though they were busy!

sxezupgqjsi1cL8a-IgwuA.text: Amazing food. Amazing service.  My fiance's food didn't come out as he had hoped and our waiter and his manager were eager to make it right and make him happy. We will definitely make this a go to spot.

-8b4M8XBHD5OjCInogDEgA.text: Went here last night for dinner and sat on the patio. It was super cute! Our waitress was in training, but both she and the trainer were awesome. Very friendly and attentive. I got chicken and brisket. The brisket was delicious! The chicken was good too, but I probably wouldn't order it again only because I liked the brisket so much more. The restaurant was very clean, but the floor in the back was so slippery, like maybe too much solution was in the water when they mopped it? I was wearing sneakers and my boyfriend was in flip flops and we were still slipping and sliding. I feel bad for anyone in heels! Overall though everything was great and we will definitely be back.

5ZlckjDDSP2ublA93GmQOg.text: AMAZING FOOD & GREAT SERVICE. It's not rated the top 30 best BBQ in the country for nothing! I basically live there, and each time is better than the last! The Q-Lada handcrafted cocktail is delicious and I also really enjoyed the Cajun Shrimp appetizer. Great atmosphere for families or a date night!

SHl5bmsRbE3SbpwQtpflBQ.text: This is a amazing place, we are regulars at the black canyon locations, don't miss out on great brisket!!!

_LKVnuC5VMHbcI_vww72DA.text: Wow. First of all, the complimentary cornbread from the start was sublime. They don't just give you a lil slice per person. No. They bring you a lot and then ask you if you want more. Next, the PPS's (PULLED PORK SAMMY) we ordered came out hot, fresh, and ready. The meat was thicc but tender at the same time. I have never been so content with a PPS. Best in the valley. I tried some of Mary's mashed potatoes and I had an immediate verbal reaction: "Flavor". Then, to our surprise, Colton offered us even more cornbread. Of course, we accepted. AND THEN, Colton brought out the COMPLIMENTARY BAG of cinny sugar donuts (free of charge)! Colton was the best server in the west: treated us right, big smiles, and plenty of BBQ and fun. In conclusion, Mary and I thought that Bobby Q was so far the highlight of senior year.

1kLcnJ8_EcjStqnMMkF04Q.text: Well, we tried both Mesa & Biltmore location. Meat is very tender but no flavor without sauce. While I like sauce, I'd like the smoked flavor of the meat to come through. If you just want it tender smothered in sauce this is the place.

d5GhkfJOKc2UlRKh_GGNBQ.text: This new location located in the Biltmore area is a little smaller than the Phoenix and Mesa/Gilbert locations but is very nice and of course the same famous barbecue. There was additional seating on the patio and of course at the bar. I also noticed some of the hostess, servers, and managers from the other two locations which was nice (if you have been to Bobby Q's before you know that the service is top of the line). Parking can get very busy here however they do have free valet parking in the back where there is a back door entrance to the restaurant. Though Bobby Q's are open 7 days a week... what I really love about this location is that it is open till 2:00am Tuesday through Saturday! So there is now great barbecue available centrally located to the valley after a late night out. I have been eating at Bobby Q for 10 years now and have eaten pretty much everything on the menu however there are a few items that are not on the menu at this location (do to it being a little smaller) that are on the original menu including 2 of my favorites being the steak sandwich and Bob's famous fish n chips but this is a barbecue restaurant and not really a deal breaker. I would say for first timers order the Q-Rolls for appetizer and the 2 or 3 meat combo that are big enough to share. My personal favorite side is the homemade Mac & cheese which is the best I have had anywhere. Oh and don't forget to grab the complimentary homemade donuts on your way out.

jdXSfhsN4anQz9Qv-QnQrQ.text: Excellent overall experience from the hostess, to the wait staff, to the food. Highly recommend a visit.  Loved the cornbread! Scrumptious. Just check out other reviews. I agree.   Try the Q Rolls! A great appetizer! The sauces were a wonderful flavor.   Half rack of ribs was huge and it falls off the bone. So good. The sides I chose were the corn and beans. These were also delicious. The beans do have meat and were very good.   My husband had the filet - he loved it. And the small bite I had was wonderful.   We were too stuffed to have dessert, but never fear - mini donuts top off the experience and you'll have something for later along with your take out box. ...because you may over order like we did and have leftovers!   A new favorite when we are in Phoenix!

3_vjDhjMiJ8h0L8pyd-KvQ.text: Lovely patio.  Good food. Great selection. Great service. Looks like we will be coming back for Happy Hour soon.   Thanks Amanda

JvY3jB4MUeAXrpyxexW8mg.text: Food was excellent! I had the smokehouse burger cooked medium and it was perfectly prepared. Natalie provides excellent service, on par if not better than other Bobby Q locations.

idSqD-dx7LnjUlkLOAd_5g.text: WOW!  We ordered take out for the office for a little July 4th celebration and I cannot recommend this place more.  The food was DELICIOUS and on time.  I was nervous that I placed the order just under 24hrs in advance, and the team at Bobby Qs still made it happen . . . and they were early.   10/10 - customer service  10/10 - B R I S K E T  10/10 - the whole experience

TsQAw1XNY5L6C4ZWN3MLrw.text: They smoke the meats at the Bobby Q's in North Phoenix early in the morning and drive the cooked meat over to the Biltmore restaurant. It is nothing like the real deal. It's worth the drive. Just drive to the one near i17.

moMDomfr3LHUzuSGfJ5h6w.text: Outstanding meal. Great short ribs and really enjoyed the bbq chicken. The help was fantastic and everything about dinner was sensational. Will definitely visit again.

photos.caption: Photo of Bobby Q - Biltmore - Phoenix, AZ, United States. Bobby Q dining room

f5LMduGTRvIyAfisUEq4mA.text: Came in to Bobby Q for lunch on Fathers Day and was seated pretty quickly! Quality of the food was amazing, and their service was equally as awesome.   We started with the Q-Rolls--which is basically egg rolls but filled with bbq meat. They come with a chipotle aioli sauce and bbq sauce on the side (the aioli was awesome!). I ordered the Beef Brisket Burger and it was perfect. Juicy, tender, and full of flavor. The side of Mac and cheese was delicious and super cheesy. And to top it all off they gave us these cinnamon crusted donuts that were hot out of the oven (which also tasted great).   Our server Ann was super helpful and friendly. Didn't need to ask for a refill of a drink because she would bring one out for you before you even realized you were almost out. My dad asked to sample one of the sides before he ordered it and she gladly brought it to him.   Great service and a great restaurant. Def will need to come back and try out the bar next time!

photos.caption: Photo of Bobby Q - Biltmore - Phoenix, AZ, United States

vntMEMGFtG4mrBgMBa4ucw.text: If you have younger children, don't come here. This is not a family friendly establishment. Both my children are well behaved but I do have a 2 year old.  I'm also very aware of other people and bothering them, so I do step out if needed and don't let my toddler act crazy. I ended up leaving my 11 year old and his father there to eat dinner because i felt so uncomfortable with eyes on my toddler and I (Without reason besides the fact that she's a toddler). I've been going to Bobby Q's on 27th ave for years and I have never felt the way I felt at this location. 3 stars because I was able to drink my tea and it was good.

gfEbBaTWkKpjF3lQECi_hA.text: We got baby back ribs and beef brisket. The meat was tender and flavorful. We also enjoyed the cornbread. For sides, we ordered potato salad, corn, brocolini, and pecan coleslaw. All were delicious!

QXTOsjOBjMA1tOHSyMvs3A.text: We dine here during Father's Day. Great food. Nice  Ambiance. And service is great. Our waiter was friendly and took care of us. I ordered 3 meat meal: ribs, brisket, and sausage (good for 2 people) with 2 sides. They're awesome for big groups of people.
